title: Pathfinder: Kingmaker - Enhanced Plus Edition
description: Celebrate Christmas is style and grab Pathfinder: Kingmaker - Enhanced Plus Edition for FREE via Epic Games Store! Pathfinder: Kingmaker - Enhanced Plus Edition is a isometric party-based computer RPG set in the Pathfinder fantasy universe.
instructions:
1. Login into your Epic Games Store account.
2. Click the button to add the game to your library

title: Santa Rockstar
description: Celebrate Christmas with the power of Rock! Grab Santa Rockstar for free via IndieGala and Slay guitar solos as a heavy metal loving Santa.
instructions:
1. Login into your free IndieGala account.
2. Scroll down and click the "Add to Your Library" button to add the game to your library.
3. Go to "My Library" to find your game.

title: I Have No Mouth And I Must Scream
description: Download I Have No Mouth, and I Must Scream for free on GOG. I Have No Mouth, and I Must Scream is a point-and-click game with five different characters, each in a unique environment.
instructions:
1. Click the "Go to giveaway" green button and you will be redirected to the GOG home page
2. Scroll down until you find the game banner.
3. Click the "Get it Free" button and login into your GOG account to unlock the game.
